quest.name: Crossroads
journal: The look in Minfilia's eyes is equal parts trepidation and determination.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)I can sense her presence, albeit faintly.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)Come on, let's look over by the crystal wall.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)She was here. On the top of this building...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)<groan>

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)What happened? I remember speaking with Minfilia...and then...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)Is something wrong?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Your hair, it's changed.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Your eyes, they've changed.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)A parting gift, I think.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)Until now, I've walked the path she set before me. The path she set before all the Minfilias.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)But she's given me a new path─a new life─that I can call my own.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)And even though she's gone, I can still feel her...warm and calm and gentle.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)I can feel the beating heart of the world, the Light that swells within it.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)And the Lightwardens. There's one here in Amh Araeng.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)Let's hurry back. The others need to know.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)You don't think Thancred will be angry with me, do you?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: It's what Minfilia wanted. I'm sure he'll understand.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: There's only one way to find out.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)I'd like to think so too, but... <sigh>

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)<sigh> I know there's no getting around it, but...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)Would you mind going on ahead? I'll be right behind you. I promise.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (-Minfilia-)I just...need a moment to think.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: You're back! We were beginning to worry about you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Forename! Thank the gods you're all right.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thou art returned. But where is Minfilia?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Welcome back. I see you fared better than Thancred.
